Sentencas: Several spinel compositions, i.e. Mn1+x Cr2-x O-4 (x = 0.7, 0.5, 0), MnFe (x) Cr2-x O-4 (x = 0.1, 1), MgMnCrO4 and Mg1+x Cr2-x O-4 (x = 0, 0.1) were synthesised and studied in terms of phase analysis, density, stability in reducing atmosphere, electrical conductivity and thermal expansion behaviour.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of chromium spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The spinel samples were single phase, with cell parameter values in a good correlation with cation sizes.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of chromium spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Most of the studied spinels were found to be unstable under reducing conditions of thermal treatment, except MnCr2O4, MgCr2O4 and Mg1.1Cr1.9O4.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of chromium spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrical properties have been investigated by impedance spectroscopy and DC conductivity measurements at temperatures between 200 and 900 A degrees C.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of chromium spinels as potential electrode support materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
